subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The British Open champion Louis Oosthuizen shot a five-under-par 67 and was tied for the lead with Richard Green of Australia and Dustin Johnson of the United States after the first round of the Scandinavian Masters  in Stockholm.
snippet: The British Open champion Louis Oosthuizen shot a five-under-par 67 and was tied for the lead with Richard Green of Australia and Dustin Johnson of the United States after the first round of the Scandinavian Masters  in Stockholm.
